description: Was replication p<0.05? (This and all other 'rep' variables in this dataset are regarding the FE pooled estimate when there were multiple internal replications.)
Did we have quantitative ES for both original and replication?
A meta-analyzable effect size obtained from ES (e.g., log-HR instead of HR), but NOT necessarily an SMD
A meta-analyzable effect size on the SMD scale
p-value for original inconsistency with replication
p-value for original inconsistency with replication, allowing for hypothetical heterogeneity
Expected probability of significance agreement under null, assuming no heterogeneity (Mathur & VanderWeele)
Expected probability of significance agreement under null, with imputed heterogeneity (Mathur & VanderWeele)
Fixed-effects estimate pooling original and replication
